thread.title: Video: Tom Crean gets trucked by Michigan player on sideline
thread.title_full: Video: Tom Crean gets trucked by Michigan player on sideline

title: Video: Tom Crean gets trucked by Michigan player on sideline
text:
Manage Video: Tom Crean gets trucked by Michigan player on sideline Indiana coach Tom Crean got a little more involved in his team's game against Michigan than he would have preferred.   
Indiana coach Tom Crean got closer to the action that he would have liked in the Hoosiers' game against Michigan Sunday afternoon. 
Wolverines forward Moritz Wagner ran right over Crean after a 3-pointer in the first half. Crean went crashing to the hardwood, and Wagner almost tripped over him, too. Unfortunately for Indiana, that wasn't the only bad part of the first half, as Michigan led 35-25 at the intermission. The Wolverines went on to win 75-63. 
Crean appeared to be okay for the rest of the game, but his body might be sore later. Author
